settings.text: Yes, we ship worldwide. Please note international delivery times will vary depending on location and may attract import costs if outside the USA.

We aim to provide our customers with the best possible service. We process and dispatch standard orders in 1-2 days. During busy times, such as Christmas, please allow a couple extra days. Larger items dispatch within 3 days through our trusted courier service.

There are no extra charges for packaging as we recycle most of what we receive—just trying to do our bit for the environment.

Our standard delivery rates are as follows:

$0 - $10: $3.95

$10 - $20: $4.95

$20 - $75: $6.95

$75+: $8.95

For furniture and large items please inquire for a price quote.

settings.item_heading: My order has not arrived. What do I do?
settings.text: Don’t worry, we record and track every parcel we send. If your order has not arrived, please send us an email with your order number, and we will find your package’s whereabouts.

settings.item_heading: When will I know when my order has been dispatched?
settings.text: Once you place your order, you will receive an emailing confirming that we have and are working on your order. You will then receive another email when we’ve shipped your order.
Of course! If you wish to collect your order from our studio just enter 'Abodestore' in the promo code box at checkout.
